snippet.title: Sword of Convallaria - Teaser Reveal | Tactics RPG
snippet.description:
Available for pre-registration now on Steam, App Store and Google Play.
Coming Fall 2023.


ABOUT THE GAME

Sword of Convallaria is a fantasy tactical RPG that revitalizes the beloved Japanese turn-based and pixel art genre. Collect and train a roster of mercenaries, customize your squad, and apply your own strategies to save the nation of Iria. Journey through a world of plot twists where every choice you make will reshape your destiny.


LINKS

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2526380/Sword_of_Convallaria/

App Store:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/sword-of-convallaria/id6451019582

Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.xd.ssrpgen

Join Discord:
https://discord.gg/858ccE62ST
